column4: Hi. Do anybody know what pci slots are sharing resources? I have MSI K9N Neo V3 mobo and I want to put TV card and Sound card in PCI slot. What is best solution for that?
It should do that automatically. do a lshw nad give me a report in interrupt (IRQ) conflicts
It's probably a custom driver like NVIDEA
It's your video card
GeForce 8600 GT
load the custom video driver
:S how to do that?
go to programs and select system
and select upgrading tool
chevk http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy-updates/xserver-xorg-driver-all
to see you are on that list
and what will I get with that? Do you have suggestion for putting my TV and Sound card in PCI slots?
I have my TV on a SV3 onnection
what ports does your graphics card provide?
I don't understand...how do you think 'card provide slots'? You think in what slot is inserted?
I see from a picture on the internet that it in cat has a SVE slot
I see from a picture on the internet that it in cat has a SV3 slot
now go to NVIDEA.. and select clone etc
first get a cablee
You also need to check that you a a SV3 port on your TV
altso called a VHS-S
Ok..i will check all that...thnx for help
